page.title: 04New Whittlesey houses
page.content: Most of the houses in Whittlesey have been built in the last forty years. One of the biggest estates is the one I live on. The houses are all less than fourteen years old. Our house is on this estate it is a typical new Whittlesey house. It is in the modern style with large windows and glass doors. The bricks are Fletton Reds and the roof is covered with Purple, Marley tiles. It has three bedrooms, (average size 4m by 2.75m), and a bathroom upstairs. A hall, lounge,( 5m by 4.5m), dinning -room and fitted kitchen downstairs. Outside we have a small front garden and a larger back garden, most of the garden is lawn or flower border. A garage for our car is joined by a car port to the house. Four of us live there.
